topic.title: How to use the same ZeroID for all devices (Tutorial)
topic.body:
Hello! J here, and today I'm going to tell you how to have the same ZeroID for all devices. All you have to do is locate "/data/users.json" and replace the existing one on the new device with it. For example on Android it would be located at 
"Internal Storage/Android/data/net.mkg20001.zeronet/files/data/users.json"

1595800278_1G8RD4XVsFK1eJZQCV42moboev12d.body: Nice! I wish I had some spare money to buy one. If I could, I would buy the PMOS version, or maybe a Manjaro ARM/Arch ARM version if they come out.
